active_contexts.statement: Eurozone Dec final mfg PMI 48.8; Germany final 47.0 shows deeper contraction vs flash.
active_contexts.market_link: Softer EU manufacturing can weigh global risk tone; supports duration bid narrative and impacts EUR/USD (6E/DX) correlations.
active_contexts.notes: Reuters notes Germany export sales drove weakness.

active_contexts.statement: NY Fed standing repo operation take-up hit record $74.6B on Dec 31 amid year-end funding needs.
active_contexts.market_link: Highlights year-end funding tightness; most relevant to front-end rates and liquidity conditions if elevated usage persists post-turn.

active_contexts.statement: ECB: Eurozone M3 y/y 3.0% in Nov (Oct 2.8%); M1 y/y 5.0% (Oct 5.2%).
active_contexts.market_link: Euro-area liquidity backdrop can matter for EUR rates and EUR-risk correlations; typically secondary vs growth/inflation shocks.
active_contexts.notes: Slow-moving series; watch bank lending follow-through.

active_contexts.statement: US S&P Global final mfg PMI confirmed 51.8 for Dec; no surprise vs forecast/prev.
active_contexts.market_link: Low incremental info vs ISM; subcomponents (orders/prices) are more relevant for rates and equity cyclicality than headline.

watchlist.statement: US cash close: MOC buy imbalance reported (S&P +1485.3M; NQ +330.8M; Dow +432.2M; Mag7 +273.3M).
watchlist.market_link: Large closing imbalances can create late-session futures dislocations and increase next-session gap sensitivity in ES/NQ.
watchlist.notes: Fast-decaying; mainly relevant into next session.

watchlist.statement: UK Dec final mfg PMI 50.6 (flash 51.2); still marginal expansion but less momentum than first read.
watchlist.market_link: UK/Europe growth tone can influence broader risk sentiment; usually modest direct impact on US index futures absent a shock.

upcoming_catalysts.name: FOMC Member Paulson Speaks
upcoming_catalysts.why_it_matters: Any reaction-function or policy-path framing can move front-end rate pricing and spill into equity duration sensitivity (ES/NQ).

upcoming_catalysts.name: FOMC Member Paulson Speaks
upcoming_catalysts.why_it_matters: A second appearance can reinforce or clarify guidance; focus on inflation vs growth balance and conditions for policy shifts.

change_log.reason: Confirmed Germany final PMI 47.0 details and driver (export sales) via Reuters (2026-01-02).
Confirmed ECB monetary aggregates and lending growth figures in Nov 2025 release dated 2026-01-02.
